code: // get closes artikel parent function getClosestArtikelParent(node){while(node !== null && node.tagName !== 'ARTICLE' ) {node = node.parentNode;}return node;}let res = [];document.querySelectorAll('img[src*="promoted.jpg"]').forEach( (img) => {el = getClosestArtikelParent(img);res.push(el);});return res;
